title: Heritage
description: Alternate cover for this ASIN can be found hereMeet Elle Bale, an average run of the mill college student. Or so it may seem. Her real name is Adabelle Gabriel and she is the daughter of an Angel King. However she is also the daughter of a Fallen Angel Demon. Follow her life as she tries to control the evils of the world whilst battling her own demons and trying to finish college without getting anyone killed.  Demons are always one step ahead.
author: Rebecca  Walton
